comments:
Here is some updated information:

The NPE occurs only when I try to call IDUtil.getOrAssignID passing in
IdentityImpl and WebAppResourceImpl.

What is strange is that IconType, DisplayName, Description, ServletImpl,
ServletType, and RunAsSpecifiedIdentity all work fine, it's only a problem when
an IdentityImpl object is passed in.

Here is the stack trace again:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emf.resource.IDTranslator.getMOFValue(IDTranslator.java:56)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emf.resource.EMF2DOMAdapterImpl.primUpdateDOMFeature(EMF2DOMAdapterImpl.java:1259)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emf.resource.EMF2DOMAdapterImpl.updateDOMFeature(EMF2DOMAdapterImpl.java:1509)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emf.resource.EMF2DOMAdapterImpl.notifyChanged(EMF2DOMAdapterImpl.java:996)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emf.resource.EMF2DOMAdapterImpl$DependencyAdapter.notifyChanged(EMF2DOMAdapterImpl.java:68)
	at
org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.impl.BasicNotifierImpl.eNotify(BasicNotifierImpl.java:229)
	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emf.resource.TranslatorResourceImpl.setID(TranslatorResourceImpl.java:308)

	at
org.eclipse.wst.common.internal.emf.resource.CompatibilityXMIResourceImpl.getURIFragment(CompatibilityXMIResourceImpl.java:106)

This is currently blocking completion of an FVT execution record, so any
attention you can give on this would be appreciated.

Hi - I'm returning unless you have a repeatable scanerio, and the EMFObject
isn't unloaded.   The NPE is coming from the EResource which returnms null  (its
a proxy).
*** Bug 105085 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

the run-as translator is one of a kind...   using a (DepenendcyTranslator)

I added a null check in the case of removing this feature....   safe fix.
